headline.print_headline: Study Finds Drug Risks With Newer Antipsychotics
headline.main: Study Finds Drug Risks With Newer Antipsychotics

byline.original: By BENEDICT CAREY and RONI CARYN RABIN

docs.lead_paragraph: Popular drugs known as atypical antipsychotics double patients’ risk of dying from sudden heart failure, a study found.
docs.snippet: Popular drugs known as atypical antipsychotics double patients’ risk of dying from sudden heart failure, a study found.
